topic.title: Advanced Tab (Generate Sample XML Files Tool)

keywords.indexterm: XML SchemasGenerate Sample XML Files toolAdvanced tab
Generate Sample XML Files toolAdvanced tab

body.p: The Generate Sample XML Files tool includes a dialog box that allows you to configure a variety of options for generating the XML files. The Advanced tab allows you to set some options regarding output values and performance.

fig.title: Generate Sample XML Files Dialog Box (Advanced Tab)

body.p:
This tab includes the following options:
Export settings Use this button to save the current settings for future use.
Import settings Use this button to load previously exported settings.
